channel.title: Quire & You
channel.description: Tips and thoughts to help you achieve your dreams and get things done.

item.title: 7 Productivity Rituals to Work Better Under Time Pressure
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: In this blog post we look at 7 productivity rituals that will help you work better and more efficiently with time pressure.

item.title: 15 Productivity Tips from Bill Gates, Elon Musk, Warren Buffet and Others
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Want to know how some of the most successful entrepreneurs maintain their success? Here are 15 productivity tips from some of the most successful entrepreneurs of all time.

item.title: Sharing is Caring - You are All Invited to Join #QuireGivesBack Giveaway
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Enter to win Amazon US$100 gift card, Premium Quire subscription, limited Quire goodies and other awesome prize packs.

item.title: 10 Key Benefits of Using a Work Management Software for Remote Teams
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Using work management software for remote teams is the easiest way to ensure all of your projects are carried out on time and to the client’s specifications.

item.title: What is Work Management Software and Why Your Team Needs One
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: A project management platform is great for managing projects. But if you want to better manage your organization, your projects and your team, then a work management platform is the ideal solution.

item.title: 10 Tips for Transforming Into a High Performing Agile Team
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Agile teams, like any, face their challenges. And while the agile method has often been discussed like a magic cure-all for organization and task efficiency, it’s got to be done properly in order to be successful.

item.title: Deprecating Support For Internet Explorer Browser Starting From 2021
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Today, we are sorry to say that Quire will no longer support Internet Explorer (IE) by December 31, 2020. This means, starting from 2021, if you’re using IE, you cannot load or view Quire’s workspace anymore.

item.title: 'Okay Google, talk to Quire!'
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Connect Quire with Google Assistant - the voice-controlled virtual assistant powered by Google. Manage your task list without having to open Quire app.

item.title: What is Agile Project Management and How Remote Teams Implement Agile With a Team Management Software
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Agile project management is about being agile and adapting to what’s in front of you. For remote teams this is most effectively achieved by using team management software.

item.title: Achieve Stress-Free Productivity with Quire and Email Integrations
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Achieve highest productivity level with Quire! Turn your emails into tasks or get instant notifications in your mailbox with the click of a button and you will be set to focus on actually getting things done!
